no_available_records: No available records, please scan something first
add_place_first: Please add a place to your favorites first
name: Name
about_message: Lazy1922 is a tool to help you scan 1922 SMS messages.
add_favorites_guide:
To add to your favorites:

1. Scan a QR code first.
2. Tap on the "Messages" tab below. 
3. Long press the message you just sent.
4. Give it a name, and you're done!
upgrade_premium_message: Upgrade to Lazy1922 Premium to avoid scaning QR codes everywhere.
favorite_places_subtitle: Save your most visited places to favorites to avoid scanning them again.
favorite_places_description: After scanning a QR code, you can add it to your favorites. All your favorites will be shown in the Home tab, and a single tap will send directly, without having to scan again.
smart_suggestions_subtitle: Get suggestions from favorite places according to your current location.
smart_suggestions_description: Lazy1922 will automatically suggest you places according to your current location, without having to search through your whole list of favorite places.
message_history_subtitle: Check out where you have been at a glance.
message_history_description: Lazy1922 can display the names of favorite places in the message history, so you can easily confirm whether you have been close to someone with COVID.
backup_and_restore_subtitle: Keep all your favorite places when switching to a new phone.
trial_message:
Thanks for trying out Lazy1922!

You now have access to all premium features. If you like them, please consider upgrading to Lazy1922 Premium and sharing it with your friends!
share_message:
Start using Lazy1922 to avoid scanning QR codes everywhere!

App Store: [link]
Google Play: [link]
try_lazy1922_premium_message:
Do you want to start the trial session?

All premium features will be unlocked during trial. The trial session will end automatically 7 days later, and will not start charging you automatically.
trial_ended_message: Your trial session has ended, thanks for trying out. If you like Lazy1922, please consider upgrading to Lazy1922 Premium and sharing it with your friends!
messages_info: Only messages with location information can be added to favorites. If all sent messages do not contain location information, please try to enable location permissions in your system settings.
